dict.string: RealLifePanel
PDEDigitalPhotoController
com.hp.impala.PDEDigitalPhotoController
Real Life Digital Photography
PDEDigitalPhotoFilterController
com.hp.impala.PDEDigitalPhotoFilterController
Adaptive Lighting
HPDigitalFlash
HPDigitalFlashImage
This feature fills in dark areas of your photographs, similar to a flash on a camera.
FlashOff
FlashLow
FlashMed
FlashHigh
This panel allows you to adjust the amount of digital flash applied to your images.
This panel allows you to adjust the amount of digital flash applied to your images. This is the current selection.
This enhancement has no digital flash applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has the lowest amount of digital flash applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has a medium amount of digital flash applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has the highest amount of digital flash applied to the preview image.
This controls the amount of digital flash applied to your images.
Deactivate enhancement feature.
Activate manual control of enhancement feature.
Printer driver software automatically determines the amount of enhancement to apply.
PDEDigitalPhotoFilterController
com.hp.impala.PDEDigitalPhotoFilterController
Photo Brightening
HPContrastEnhance
HPContrastImage
This feature will enhance the contrast of your photographs.
ContrOff
ContrLow
ContrMed
ContrHigh
This panel allows you to adjust the amount of contrast enhancement applied to your images.
This panel allows you to adjust the amount of contrast enhancement applied to your images. This is the current selection.
This enhancement has no contrast enhancement applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has the lowest amount of contrast enhancement applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has a medium amount of contrast enhancement applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has the highest amount of contrast enhancement applied to the preview image.
This controls the amount of contrast enhancement applied to your images.
Deactivate enhancement feature.
Activate manual control of enhancement feature.
Printer driver software automatically determines the amount of enhancement to apply.
PDEBasicImageEnhancementController
com.hp.impala.PDESmartFocusController
Smart Focus
This feature will enhance the appearance of low-resolution photographs.
SmartOff
SmartOn
This panel allows you to adjust whether the SmartFocus enhancement is applied to your images.
This panel allows you to adjust whether the SmartFocus enhancement is applied to your images. This is the current selection.
This enhancement has no SmartFocus applied to the preview image.
This preview gives you an idea of what the SmartFocus enhancement does.
Use this control to turn off the SmartFocus enhancement.
Use this control to turn on the SmartFocus enhancement.
PDEDigitalPhotoFilterController
com.hp.impala.PDEDigitalPhotoFilterController
Smoothing
HPSmoothing
HPSmoothingImage
This feature will smooth, or reduce noise in your photographs.
SmoothOff
SmoothLow
SmoothMed
SmoothHigh
This panel allows you to adjust the amount of smoothing applied to your images.
This panel allows you to adjust the amount of smoothing applied to your images. This is the current selection.
This enhancement has no smoothing applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has the lowest amount of smoothing applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has a medium amount of smoothing applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has the highest amount of smoothing applied to the preview image.
This controls the amount of smoothing applied to your images.
Deactivate enhancement feature.
Activate manual control of enhancement feature.
Printer driver software automatically determines the amount of enhancement to apply.
PDEDigitalPhotoFilterController
com.hp.impala.PDEDigitalPhotoFilterController
Sharpness
HPSharpness
HPSharpnessImage
This feature will enhance the sharpness of your photographs.
SharpOff
SharpLow
SharpMed
SharpHigh
This panel allows you to adjust the amount of sharpening applied to your images.
This panel allows you to adjust the amount of sharpening applied to your images. This is the current selection.
This enhancement has no sharpness applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has the lowest amount of sharpness applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has a medium amount of sharpness applied to the preview image.
This enhancement has the highest amount of sharpness applied to the preview image.
This controls the amount of sharpening applied to your images.
Deactivate enhancement feature.
Activate manual control of enhancement feature.
Printer driver software automatically determines the amount of enhancement to apply.
PDEBasicImageEnhancementController
com.hp.impala.PDERedEyeController
Auto Red-eye Removal
This feature will remove red eye from your photographs.
RedEyeOff
RedEyeOn
This panel allows you to adjust whether red-eye removal is applied to photographs.
This panel allows you to adjust whether red-eye removal is applied to photographs. This is the current selection.
This enhancement has no Red Eye applied to the preview image.
This preview gives you an idea of what the Red Eye enhancement does.
Use this control to turn off the Red Eye enhancement.
Use this control to turn on the Red Eye enhancement.
